title: Las Vegas Raiders Name Sandra Douglass Morgan New President; Ms. Morgan is the first Black female team president in the National Football League
text:
"It is the honor of a lifetime to join the Raiders at one of the most defining times in the team's history," Ms. Morgan said in a statement. "This team's arrival in Las Vegas has created a new energy and opportunities we never dreamed possible."

The team hired Ms. Morgan to lead the franchise less than a year after former Raiders coach Jon Gruden resigned. An investigation had found emails from Mr. Gruden that included a racial trope and antigay language. Mr. Gruden had been one of the NFL's most prominent coaches.

Ms. Morgan is a board member for Caesars Entertainment Inc., Allegiant Travel Co. and Fidelity National Financial. She chaired the Nevada Gaming Control Board from early 2019 through most of 2020. Before that, she was a commissioner on the Nevada Gaming Commission for less than a year, according to her LinkedIn page.
